Go FAB > Create expense > Scan 2. Upload or capture an image receipt 3. On the confirmation page, click on the receipt to open the receipt modal 4. Verify that the crop button appears 5. Click on the crop button 6. Crop the image and click on the save button 7. Verify that the image is cropped 8. Open a scan expense 9. Click on the receipt 10. Verify that the crop button appears 11. Click on the crop button 12. Crop the image and click on the save button 13. Verify that the image is cropped 14. Go to 3-dot menu> Delete ## Expected Result: Receipt should be deleted and no errors should appear ## Actual Result: Unexpected error appears when delete cropped receipt ## Workaround: Unknown ## Platforms: - [ ] Android: App - [ ] Android: mWeb Chrome - [ ] iOS: App - [ ] iOS: mWeb Safari - [ ] iOS: mWeb Chrome - [x] Windows: Chrome - [ ] MacOS: Chrome / Safari ## Screenshots/Videos https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/bdb05616-8cca-4817-8217-1e5d1c3f090e [View all open jobs on GitHub](https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues?q=is%3Aopen+is%3Aissue+label%3A%22Help+Wanted%22)

title: [$250] PR Reviewer Checklist fails if more than 1 comment contains `# Reviewer Checklist` text

labels.name: External
labels.description: Added to denote the issue can be worked on by a contributor

labels.name: Daily
labels.description: KSv2

labels.name: Help Wanted
labels.description: Apply this label when an issue is open to proposals by contributors

labels.name: Bug
labels.description: Something is broken. Auto assigns a BugZero manager.

body:
In https://github.com/Expensify/App/pull/82448#issuecomment-3930910459, MelvinBot posted the comment: ``` The failing check is `checklist`, which was triggered by a `pull_request_review` event. This check looks for a comment containing `# Reviewer Checklist` with all items checked off — it's a process gate, not a code issue. **To fix this:** A reviewer needs to post the [Reviewer Checklist](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Expensify/App/main/contributingGuides/REVIEWER_CHECKLIST.md) as a comment on this PR with all items checked. Once posted, the check will pass on the next run. No code changes are needed. ``` Later I posted the completed Reviewer Checklist in https://github.com/Expensify/App/pull/82448#issuecomment-3969372383. However, the `PR Reviewer Checklist` check continued to fail. The workflow does a simple `indexOf('# Reviewer Checklist')` search through comments in chronological order and stops at the first match, so it was never finding my checklist.
Issue OwnerCurrent Issue Owner: @truph01
Upwork Automation - Do Not Edit
  • Upwork Job URL: https://www.upwork.com/jobs/~022027170879042388990
  • Upwork Job ID: 2027170879042388990
  • Last Price Increase: 2026-02-26
